CustomField.description: If checked, “Bill To” and “Ship To” text values on the Invoice are retained when “Bill To” and “Ship To” Account or Contact lookups are updated, if not null.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, “Bill To” and “Ship To” text values on the Invoice are retained when “Bill To” and “Ship To” Account or Contact lookups are updated, if not null.
CustomField.label: Retain Invoice text values
